website_summaries.verdict: A decent quality set for an affordable price that includes all the standard tools.
pros: Includes nail clippers, toenail clippers, diagonal nail clipper, scissors, cuticle trimmer, ear pick, push stick, tweezers, peeling knife, nail file, blackhead remover, and v-shaped push stick
Included case is sturdy and stylish
cons: Other sets have higher quality tools for a similar price

customer_reviews.title: Don't Put It In Your Luggage
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little manicure kit but I ran into one problem with it. I stuck it in my shower kit which was packed in checked luggage on an outbound and return flight from Tucson to Sacramento and back. On both legs of the trip TSA opened and inspected my checked luggage to determine what the case contained. Apparently the case is a type of metal which triggers their detection system. If you're not going to fly with this kit I'd recommend it but if it might end up on an airplane, I'd try something else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: These are a great quality for beginning manicurist I got this for my step daughter she is 11 and they all worked great for her not too sharp not too crazy perfect for a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Stephinie Simons

customer_reviews.title: The clippers and tools inside seems to be good quality. It makes an awesome gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife as a Christmas present and she loves it. The clippers and tools inside seems to be good quality. It makes an awesome gift. I ended up actually buying her a second one because she asked for it although after a year it’s still in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. All clippers work well. I love the compact case, which makes it easy to travel with. Love it, I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: ChristineML

customer_reviews.title: I like this kit
customer_reviews.text: I like this kit . I think it's good for a personal kit however I'm not a professional so I don't know if it's OK for professional use however I love it . Makes me want chocolate everytime I see the color of the case and the tools are very sharp so be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffanycyberkitty

customer_reviews.title: Extremely durable, professional tools
customer_reviews.text: These tools are great, I've been searching for a new set for my purse for weeks! I have not found anything in various stores, and if i did, they were very cheaply made. This is an extremely durable, professional looking set. I am one of those people who use this daily to primp my nails, pull off excess cuticles and what not, every single tool is very well made and sharp where need be.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Nice case, cheap tools
customer_reviews.text: I like the case but the tools inside are of mediocre quality at best. They aren't sturdy and won't last long. The tweezers are completely useless since they don't grab hair at all. The tools are all basically dollar store quality, but the case is nice and pretty sturdy. I'll use the tools until they dull out or break, then swap them out for a better quality set, but still use the case for storage and organization. The case is a tad bigger than I anticipated, so check the dimensions before ordering so you know what to expect.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: ... travelers gift just to have on hand at home great product great price highly recommend perfect in every way ...
customer_reviews.text: my husband loves it because all the features he gets reoccurring hang nails thiss kit has it all travelers gift just to have on hand at home great product great price highly recommend perfect in every way not too much not to little and can take care of all your needs from your hands to your toes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Piece missing
customer_reviews.text: Missing cuticle remover from set and box was opened. 11 piece instead of 12 as described. I have bought several sets on Amazon over the years as gifts and have never had this problem. Think twice before getting from this company. It is not expensive but the principle of getting what you pay for comes into play here.
customer_reviews.author: joi  albright

customer_reviews.title: I chose this because of the online STAR rating, hmm...
customer_reviews.text: What a disappointment. I very rarely write reviews, but this product was of such shoddy quality I felt a duty to let AMAZON know. You can do much better and typically do.. Thanks for the no hassle refund and return as usual; that's what keeps me coming back!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: TREAT YOURSELF!!
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT THIS NAIL SET FOR MYSELF AS A TREAT. I OFTENTIMES THOUGHT I'D GET ONE AS A CHRISTMAS GIFT, BUT THE GUYS NEVER TOOK THE HINT. THE TOOLS ARE SHARP! THE CASE SNAPS SHUT! IT'S PERFECT! TREAT YOURSELF. I DON'T THINK I REMEMBER EVEN SEEING ONE OF THESE AT THE LOCAL BEAUTY SUPPLY STORE. GLAD I GOT IT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great stocking stuffer
customer_reviews.text: This is really a great set! They have thought if everything. I purchased eight for stocking stuffers, and the only negative was the clasp could be a bit tighter. As a mom/ gramma I could see little curious ones easily getting hurt. Even a zipper closure might be better. Pink for the ladies and brown for the ladies who hate pink or the guys!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: The tools are very basic.
customer_reviews.text: The nail clippers in this set are very basic. In my opinion somewhat substandard. However, I got this mostly for the case. I put my own Clippers which are much better into the spaces where the original Clippers are located. The other tools seem to be decent. I have not tried them yet though.
customer_reviews.author: Prince Robair

customer_reviews.title: don't buy this junk
customer_reviews.text: After only a few months one of the nail clippers shattered not bent or broke but shattered into several pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The nail clippers broke when I pulled them out of the case and you pieces went everywhere. I bought this for travel so have had it in my luggage for 30 days so I cannot even return it for a refund. Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Over all it's a great product and a perfect way to keep everything in ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of this compact and classy-looking kit. A couple of the pieces seemed a tiny bit rusted at the hinge but it was not a big enough deal to return it. Over all it's a great product and a perfect way to keep everything in one place. I carry this in my backpack and switch it from bag to purse to purse to whatever bag is necessary. It has come in handy on multiple occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Shesteiny

customer_reviews.title: This product is defective - when you squeeze the handles ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is defective - when you squeeze the handles to use the nipper they collapse. I have been attempting to have a return label mailed to me,but I am getting labels resent for me to PRINT - I do not have the ability to print at this time and therefore need the label mailed to me. Please mail it at your earliest convenience. Thank you for your assistance.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma K

customer_reviews.title: Nail Assistant
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this nail clipper set due to how cute it looked and also all of the nail tools ha came with it. I used this kit for a few months and was very satisfied but after a few months the big toenail clipper fell apart and a few more of the other tools. The quality of the tools is great back just look out for that after a few months of use they will start to fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The instruments are very usable and have good edges; however
customer_reviews.text: The instruments are very usable and have good edges; however, they are a bit difficult to get out of the case as there is nothing to grip, no thickness in the "handles", to remove them. You'll need a manicure after breaking a nail digging them out. The case is cute and compact, but sometimes things suffer for the effort.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was a hit for office Christmas gifts
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the ladies in my office for Christmas. They were a HIT. This is a great, high quality set. I ordered extra, so of course I had to keep one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect manicure set
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product it has everything you could absolutely think of that you could use for a manicure set I use this for everything I've used this for somebody else I love this product great for the price and the kit is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Anne Alston

customer_reviews.title: A best buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a travel size/purse size set. It is exceptional value for the price. Carried on an airplane, it would have to be in checked luggage. I bought several to use as stocking stuffers.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Camfield

customer_reviews.title: Amazing set
customer_reviews.text: This set of tools is perfect for any manicure or pedicure. The tools are amazing quality - it feels like they are going to last a long time. The case itself is durable and easy to bring along on a trip. The quality of the tools is the best part - the cuticle trimmer works amazing and quickly (I have never cut myself with it, unlike others).
customer_reviews.author: Helen Chau

customer_reviews.title: Great product. One issue.
customer_reviews.text: Everything here is great. Only issue i find is that the scissors seem to be curved which makes for a weird angle if you want to cut it straight. Everything else is good and easy to carry. Very light. gets the job done
customer_reviews.author: Cesar

customer_reviews.title: Major surprise
customer_reviews.text: For $10? Most items I find for $10 are a scam. This really surprised me. I bought this back in Feb 2019; I didn't want to review it right away. I was waiting for it to fall apart. Ever the sceptic. The casing holds up the test of time. I can't express how jealous ladies have been seeing this case in all its glory to discover it's not a purse but a full on, classy, nail kit. I hope you moved more items because of me. Thanks for the great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sable Monique

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: This is an extremely nice and well constructed set. The casing is solid and heavy. The tools are of metal construct and for the price I don't believe a nicer package can be found.

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this. I keep it in my purse at all times. The quality of the case and the tools are both great and I can tell this will last me a long time. Every woman should have one of these.

customer_reviews.title: Clipper broke on first use

customer_reviews.text: I would not give these as a gift or take traveling - two of the clippers broke first use on soft nails - they are inexpensive so I guess you get what you pay for....

customer_reviews.title: My nails look spectacular,
customer_reviews.text: This is the nicest manicure set I've ever owned. It not only does wonders for the fingernails but it also has the same kind of items for men's nails. I am so glad I purchased this nail kit.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well made

customer_reviews.title: This nail set is super adorable! It's pretty thin compared to the zipper ...
customer_reviews.text: This nail set is super adorable! It's pretty thin compared to the zipper style cases so I like that it takes up less space. I LOVE the variety of tools. But I took two stars off because one of the most important parts of a manicure set, to me, is a good pair of cuticle clippers. While the scissors and nail clippers worked fine, the cuticle clippers were super dull.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Considering the price, I was very happy with this purchase. Still in use after I think about 2 years.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a high quality product for a low price. I was just looking for a nail clipper but get so much more out of this set. It has all kinds of tools I never knew I needed and is a perfect addition to my self care ritual. The dead skin remover is the TRUTH, I was able to remove some dead skin that nail salons hadn’t even removed. This is an amazing product and well worth the buy!

customer_reviews.title: Compact, but no tweezers...
customer_reviews.text: It's great, compact, has lots of tools, but no tweezers! Though I knew that ahead of time from the picture I didn't realize how much I really want to have tweezers in there. Otherwise it's perfect.

Then I opened it and the tools look used and dirty. Also the inside of the case is dented and the tools look cheap. I didn’t even want to touch them. I was so excited to get a nice nail kit but will not be getting another one from Amazon.

customer_reviews.title: Dont hesitate to buy! This is so worth the cost! All the tools work as they should and are of quality metal! SO perfect!

customer_reviews.title: The case is the best part of this product

product_meta.title: Keiby Citom Professional Stainless Steel Nail Clipper Set Nail Tools Manicure & Pedicure Set of 12pcs - Travel & Grooming Kit with Luxurious Case (Pink)
feature_bullets: Made of top quality steel and never rusts,built to last a lifetime
Processed by a special technology,have a extreme hardness and super sharp
Perfect matching between the radian of blade of nail clippers and the radian of your nails
The luxury fashion case made by grade material, not fade and difficult to wear
